short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This application is chrome extension to display the chart by language of the author repository on the Github author page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This application is an extension to display the chart by language of the author repository on the Github dashboard.
